text: Giuseppe Carando (born 18 March 1964) is an Italian rower. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Turin
title: Giuseppe Carando
